trained using.from sentence: The models are trained using Adam with hyperparameters selected on development set .

chose.from sentence: We chose two one - layer LSTM for read / write modules on the tasks other than QA on which we used two - layer LSTM .

obtained for.from sentence: The pre-trained 300 - D Glove 840B vectors and 100 - D Glove 6B vectors were obtained for the word embeddings .

crop or pad.from sentence: We crop or pad the input sequence to a fixed length .

regularized by.from sentence: The models were regularized by using dropouts and an l 2 weight decay .
